adgm_regulations.content: ADGM requires all companies to maintain proper corporate governance structures including a board of directors and regular meetings.
Annual financial statements must be prepared in accordance with IFRS and filed with ADGM within 6 months of year end.
All companies must maintain a registered office address within ADGM and notify any changes within 14 days.
Directors must act in good faith and in the best interests of the company, avoiding conflicts of interest.
Companies must maintain statutory registers including register of members, directors, and charges.
